ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS (TDG) REGULATIONS by clarifying requirements, addressing safety issues, aligning the TDG Regulations with changes to international recommendations and international modal requirements, and continuing to improve safety in the transportation of dangerous goods.
